Hero.title: Cherished Craftsmanship for Your Space
Hero.description: We create unique spaces for both residential and commercial clients, combining traditional artisanship with cutting-edge technology.

WhyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Rovestone Brothers?
WhyChooseUs.description: At Rovestone Brothers, we're passionate about providing exceptional furniture that enhances your home's beauty and comfort. Each piece is thoughtfully designed and built to last

OurTrustedClients.title: Our Trusted Clients
OurTrustedClients.description: We're proud to have worked with these prestigious brands who trust our craftsmanship and design philosophy.

GetInTouch.title: Subscribe to Our Newsletter
GetInTouch.description: Stay updated with our latest designs, offers, and tips for creating your dream space.

ContactUs.title: Ready to Transform Your Space?
ContactUs.description: Contact us today to discuss your project and discover how we can bring your vision to life.

Footer.description: Rovestone Brothers is a family-owned business dedicated to creating beautiful, functional furniture that enhances your home. Our commitment to quality and craftsmanship is evident in every piece we create.

ProductsHero.title: Our Product Collection
ProductsHero.description: Explore our range of handcrafted furniture designed to elevate your space.

Products.title: Bespoke Furniture & Joinery
Products.description: At Rovestone Brothers, we create bespoke furniture for every room of the home or office. We're committed to our beautiful kitchens, dressing rooms, and specialist joinery. Each piece is carefully designed and crafted to meet our clients' specific needs.

VisitShowRoom.title: Experience Luxury in Person
VisitShowRoom.description: Visit our showroom to explore our complete collection and let our design experts help you create your perfect space. Touch, feel, and experience the quality of our furniture firsthand.
